email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON for a freight quote of USD 25 per ton. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. Laycan is Nov 15-20. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 per ton seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 22 per ton? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Considering your request, I can revise the freight quote to USD 23 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. The laycan remains Nov 15-20. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the freight quote of USD 23 per ton and the demurrage rate of USD 20,000 per day. Please proceed with the contract preparation for the MV OCEAN HORIZON with laycan Nov 15-20.

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Contract Sent
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Great to hear that. I have sent the contract for your review. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Best,
Sarah Lee
